1.16.5.1.16.5-0.10.0-Beta28:
Bug Fixes:
- Fixed crash on server startup due to client-only method.
1.16.5.1.16.5-0.10.0-Beta27:
New Features:
- Growth Logic Kits now have properties. These are work in the same way as those used by gen features and drop creators.

Enhancements:
- Global drop creators can now be defined in the `drop_creators/global` subfolder (relative to `trees/[namespace]`).
- Gen Features, Drop Creators, and Growth Logic Kits can now have configurations defined in their own file (`gen_features/configurations`, `drop_creators/configurations`, and `growth_logic_kits/configurations` respectively, relative to `trees/[namespace]`).
- A lot of code cleanup and refactors.
- Reworked Json deserialisation, error and warning logging should be much more thorough now.
- Added `NOT` operator to Json biome selectors.
- `Configurable#get` is now non-null (calling on a null property causes a crash).

Bug Fixes:
- Fixed root blocks not connecting properly underwater.
- Fix incorrect check causing leaves to force chunk loading (port of #646).

Please note that the following add-ons will need an update due to the code changes in this version. They have each been released simultaneously and so should be uploaded by the time you're reading this. 
- DT+
- DT Atum 2
- DT BOP
- DT BYG
- DT Nature's Aura
- DT Neapolitan
1.16.5.1.16.5-0.10.0-Beta26:
New Features:
+ Added `"OR"` and `"AND"` appliers to datapack worldgen biome selectors.
+ Added `"names_or"` applier to datapack worldgen biome selectors.
+ Allowed rooty soils to read blockstate of primitive soil for checking validity and deciding the proper soil block to use.

Enhancements:
- Moved generateDirtBucketRecipes to common config

Bug Fixes:
- Fixed logs and sticks dropping above the max stack size.
- Fixed substitute soils not assigning properly
1.16.5.1.16.5-0.10.0-Beta25:
New Features:
+ Added block state, block model, and item model generators.

Enhancements:
+ Accept `shears` ToolType rather than relying on type-bound `ShearsItem` detection.
- GrowthLogicKit.newDirectionSelected now takes `World` and `BlockPos` parameter.
- Shrunk falling tree entity bounding box to reduce lag (culling bounding box is kept large to prevent it disappearing at a distance).

Bug Fixes:
- Fixed crash whilst generating vines (#618).
- Fixed CME whilst exploding a large amount of trees (#620).
- Fixed pathfinding issues around dynamic trees (#592).
- Fixed world ticking exception with SnowRealMagic (#617).
1.16.5.1.16.5-0.10.0-Beta24:
New Features:
+ Added mega jungle trees to jungle biomes
+ Added alternativeLeavesGenFeature
+ Added randomPredicateGenFeature
Enhancements:
- Removed vanilla leaves connecting to dynamic trees
- Reverted growPulse command to work instantly again
Bug Fixes:
- Fixed palm type trees not rendering correctly sometimes
- Fixed trunk shell blocks sometimes staying behind when chopping down thick trees
1.16.5.1.16.5-0.10.0-Beta23:
Enhancements:
- Built-in integration with Better Weather seasons.
- `preferredSeasonMod` config option for selecting which season provider should be used.
1.16.5.1.16.5-0.10.0-Beta22:
Bug Fixes:
- Fixed NoSuchElementException when generating a conifer topper.
1.16.5.1.16.5-0.10.0-Beta21:
Bug Fixes:
- Fixed secondary leaves chance property not being registered to bush gen feature.
1.16.5.1.16.5-0.10.0-Beta20:
Bug Fixes:
- Fixed crash whilst generating bush gen features.
- Fixed silk touch not dropping leaves.
- Fixed absent wart block drops.

Tree Pack Changes:
- Weighted drop type now uses WeightedList.
- Added `secondary_leaves_chance` property to bush gen feature.
1.16.5.1.16.5-0.10.0-Beta19:
Bug Fixes:
- Fixed crash with DT Traverse due to bush gen features not having a default property value.

Tree Pack Changes:
- Added `can_craft_sapling_to_seed` and `can_craft_seed_to_sapling` properties to Species for individual control over automatically generated recipes.
1.16.5.1.16.5-0.10.0-Beta18:
New Features:
- Soil blocks are now defined through Tree Packs.
- Drop creators are now defined through Tree Packs, allowing customization of tree drops.
- Updated Patchouli manual to 2nd edition.

Bug Fixes:
- Fixed threading issue due to some modded dimensions being generated on alternate threads.
- Various minor bug fixes.
1.16.5.1.16.5-0.10.0-Beta17:
New Features:
- Tree branches can now be waterlogged.
- Surface roots can now be waterlogged.
- Added Block and Item tag generators for addons.

Tree Pack Changes:
- Added `fire_proof` property to families.
- Added `max_signal_depth` property to families.
- Added `can_grow_on_ground` property to leaves_properties.
- Added `sapling_name` property to species.
- Added `seed_name` property to species.
1.16.5.1.16.5-0.10.0-Beta16:
Bug Fixes:
- Fixed tree pack loading order.
1.16.5.1.16.5-0.10.0-Beta15:
Enhancements:
+ The burgeoning potion now fills fertility when used and persists until fertility depletes instead of running on a timer.
+ Bone meal now restores two points of fertility on application.
+ Added many new custom tags and better integration with vanilla tags. Details can be found here: https://github.com/ferreusveritas/DynamicTrees/wiki/Tags.
Changes:
- Disabled persistence and fertility potions, will be removed entirely in the next version.
- Beehives are now slightly rarer in forests.
Technical Changes:
- Certain species location overrides will now require a separate sapling block to function (to fix crash with Minecolonies).
- Json biome selectors can now filter biomes by their category.
- Json block property appliers can edit the light block property to make blocks like leaves emit light.
- Branch model loaders now automatically default to a thick branch model if the family's maximum branch radius is greater than 8.
- Added Palm species type, leaves properties, and growth logic (for add-ons to access, there are no palm trees in base DT).
Bug Fixes:
- Fixed crash with Minecolonies.
- Fixed harvest multiplier being ineffectual to log drops.
- Fixed dynamic leaves dropping primitive leaves when broken without shears.
- Fixed dynamic birch leaves colours not being changed by serene seasons.
1.16.5.1.16.5-0.10.0-Beta14:
Bug Fixes:
- Fixed density selectors - forests should now be as dense as they were in 1.12. 
- Fixed trees not spawning in modified wooded badlands.
- Fixed loot tables support for certain blocks (temporary until drop creators are made). 
- Fixed not clearing model caches which caused a memory leak.
1.16.5.1.16.5-0.10.0-Beta13:
Enhancements:
- Added config option for whether or not the player can bone meal a tree.
Bug Fixes:
- Fixed commands not being registered on server reload, meaning they would disappear. 
- Fixed trunk shell hardness bug. 
- Fixed trunk shell not disappearing on neighbour update.
- Fixed potted dynamic sapling consuming items in creative mode. 
- Fixed bug where tree generation would be cancelled by grass or ferns.
1.16.5.1.16.5-0.10.0-Beta12:
Enhancements:
- Updated lang files for spanish and french
Bug Fixes:
- Fixed thick logs being transparent
1.16.5.1.16.5-0.10.0-Beta11:
Enhancements:
- Error logging and language improvements
- Added bare cell kit for use in addons
- Other minor improvements
Bug fixes:
- Fixed season seed labels being incorrectly assigned
- Prevented bee nests from filling forests over time
- Other minor fixes
1.16.5.1.16.5-0.10.0-Beta10:
Enhancements:
- Internal changes to tree fall animation for extra add-on capabilities. 
Bug Fixes:
- Fixed vanilla tree cancellers.
1.16.5.1.16.5-0.10.0-Beta9:
Enhancements:
+ Create's tree fertiliser now gives the same effect as a burgeoning potion.
- Updated Spanish translation [translated by Jorgegiral].
- Updated Mexican Spanish translation [translated by EdicionGamerYT].
Bug Fixes:
- Fixed apple trees not spawning in world gen (due to absent JoCodes). 
- Fixed two config options having the same ID, making configuration of seed drops rates inaccessible. 
- Fixed potted sapling not having a localisation.
1.16.5.1.16.5-0.10.0-Beta8:
Enhancements:
+ Added rooty terracotta. 
+ Rooty blocks can now use custom colour multipliers.
+ Added localisations for staff tooltips. 
- Updated French translation [translated by @19PixelsPlaced]
+ The trunk shell block can now be waterlogged. 
Tree Packs:
- Improvements to how tree packs are reloaded.
+ The registry name of the generated leaves block can be changed in the leaves properties Json via block_registry_name. 
+ Additional "valid" leaves can now be added to the species Json via valid_leaves. 
Bug Fixes:
- Fixed an ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException with the tree falling animation.
- Fixed CraftTweaker incompatibility. 
- Fixed an issue where primitive logs and sticks couldn't be found from other mods.
1.16.5.1.16.5-0.10.0-Beta7:
Enhancements:
- Added Polish translation. [PR from SubcarpathianSkull]
- Added soil life argument to /dt settree.
- Improved nether worldgen
Bug Fixes:
- Fixed trees being unbreakable in multiplayer servers
- Fixed crashes related to ConcurrentModificationExcpetions.
- Fixed dynamic tree configured feature not being registered properly.
